attributes.title: how did they even do this????
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app as a joke a few weeks ago.. little did i know what that would bring...

it started off simple, minor inconveniences, my microwave not making popcorn fully, the dog i was taking care of wining more, my water machine broke, infinitesimal things like that... then... it started getting worse... people started treating me... different... i would go to the store and the cashier would always have a passive-aggressive attitude to my, what i like to think, more optimistic attitude. after two weeks or so... is was so, so much worse. i sit heere in my room writing this as a last resort, because even after i deleted the app, it fallowed me. i started to see this... thing. i saw is more and more as the days got darker, almost slower it seemed. until, yesterday. i saw it fully. before yesterday i only ever really saw it out of the corner of my eye, but yesterday.. oh god yesterday. with its yellow-brown tinted, infinitely blood covered teeth, and itâ€™s bright eyes that stood out from the rest of its dark body, almost like it was covered in black paint that was forbidden from touching its eyes or mouth... it nearly killed me. iâ€™m hiding now, but for all i know, it knows where i am no matter what. that seems to be what happens in horror movies like this. i can hope for the best but i will never, and i mean never mentally recover.
